text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse @marklevinshow @FoxNews Dear Chester, YOU GOT CAUGHT NOW YOURE TRYING TO DUMP IT OFF ON SOMEONE ELSE--kinda like you said oBama left you broken tests... HTF COULD HE LEAVE YOU BROKEN CORONAVIRUS TESTS WHEN THIS CORONAVIRUS TESTS WEREN'T INVENTED YET?  YOU'RE A REAL MORON CHESTER CHEETAH!
